backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking UI files and components to requirements REQ-1 and REQ-2.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short human-written summaries for key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a set of color and layout CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component rendering a themed page with a centered non-functional button plus header and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor based on the user's identity and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout helpers, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a warm playful OKLCH color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry mounting React with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, features, and pending requests for the Do Nothing Button app.
